tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (VB Be) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN sunshine)) (PP (IN on) (NP (DT a) (JJ rainy) (NN day))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [sunshine/NN cop>Be/VB det>the/DT nmod:on>[day/NN case>on/IN det>a/DT amod>rainy/JJ] punct>./.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (DT A) (NN smile)) (, ,) (NP (DT a) (NN nod)) (, ,) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN grin)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (NNP joy.Give)) (VP (S (NP (CC &))) (PP (TO to) (NP (DT all))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [smile/NN det>A/DT punct>,/, appos>[nod/NN det>a/DT] punct>,/, appos>[grin/NN det>a/DT nmod:of>[joy.Give/NNP case>of/IN dep>[&/CC nmod:to>[all/DT case>to/TO]]]] punct>./.]
